duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead activities involving product impact assessments, product quarantine, non-conformance reporting/issue resolution, auditing of production areas, and procedural updates to ensure compliance with 21CFR820, ISO, and internal requirements.
Participate in Production Triage team as the lead Quality member by providing direction and support to the non-conformance process and product quarantine.

Perform Product Quarantine activities, review/disposition non-conformance records, and conduct audits of personnel and processes in manufacturing areas for practice versus procedures and regulatory requirements compliance.
Initiate and lead QA Operations process improvement projects, and conduct failure investigations to analyze system or process failures and implement preventive and corrective actions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering or related field (Master's preferred)
